mapper.insert: INSERT INTO C_MEMBERS (ID, EMAIL, USERNAME, PASSWORD, NAME, AGE, GENDER, ADDRESS, PHONE_NUMBER, DRIVER_LICENSE_NUMBER) VALUES (members_seq.nextval, #{email}, #{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{address}, #{phone_number}, #{driver_license_number})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM C_MEMBERS WHERE email=#{email} and password=#{password}
SELECT count(*) from C_MEMBERS where email=#{email}
SELECT count(*) from C_MEMBERS where name=#{name}
SELECT email FROM C_MEMBERS cm WHERE PHONE_NUMBER = #{phone_number} and DRIVER_LICENSE_NUMBER = #{driver_license_number}
SELECT password FROM C_MEMBERS cm WHERE EMAIL = #{email} AND USERNAME = #{username} AND DRIVER_LICENSE_NUMBER = #{driver_license_number}
